Initializer# init(minLength:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
init(minLength: CGFloat? = nil)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/SwiftUI/Spacer/init(minLength:)#see-also)

### [Creating a spacer](/documentation/SwiftUI/Spacer/init(minLength:)#Creating-a-spacer)

[`var minLength: CGFloat?`](/documentation/swiftui/spacer/minlength)The minimum length this spacer can be shrunk to, along the axis or axes of expansion.
